text: Leif Holger Larsen (27 January 1954 - 8 May 2015) was a Norwegian diplomat. From 2014 until his death in 2015, he served as Norway's ambassador to Pakistan. Larsen was born in Stavanger. He was married and had a son. Larsen died on 8 May 2015 in a helicopter crash in Naltar, Gilgit-Baltistan, Pakistan. He was 61. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Accidental deaths Category:Aviation deaths Category:Ambassadors of Norway
title: Leif Holger Larsen
